title: After Scathing Remarks on Crypto Scam, Khamzat Chimaev Hits Back at Sean Strickland’s Controversial Style at UFC 312
description: Sean Strickland never bites his tongue. Whether it’s about fighting, politics, or personal vendettas, the former middleweight champ always finds a way to stir the pot. His latest target? Khamzat Chimaev. At the UFC 312 press conference, Strickland fired off a salvo at Chimaev leveling accusations of scamming his fans with a Bitcoin scheme. In […]The post After Scathing Remarks on Crypto Scam, Khamzat Chimaev Hits Back at Sean Strickland’s Controversial Style at UFC 312 appeared first on EssentiallySports.

title: Global supply chains brace for shock as Trump’s tariffs bite from cars to crypto
description: Donald Trump’s new import tariffs targeting Mexico, Canada, and China threaten a global trade war, driving up costs in sectors from cars to beverages, rattling crypto markets, and fuelling inflationary worries.Read more: Global supply chains brace for shock as Trump’s tariffs bite from cars to crypto

source.name: Business Matters | The Uk's Leading Sme Business Magazine
